sentences.en: About 60,000 subscribers have special adapters to receive and decode the signals.
sentences.cn: 大约6万用户拥有特殊的适配器来接收和转换信号。

sentences.en: All he had to do was decode it and pass it over.
sentences.cn: 他需要做的就是将它破译然后转给他人。

sentences.en: But first they have to decode the scanner's algorithm.
sentences.cn: 但是他们首先要破解感应器的运算规则.

sentences.en: Can you decode this code telegram?
sentences.cn: 你能译出这封密码电报 吗 ?

sentences.en: Capture and decode data on a network.
sentences.cn: 捕获和解码网络中的数据.

sentences.en: DeCODE has one further piece of evidence in its favor.
sentences.cn: DeCODE拥有另外一项对其有利的证据.

sentences.en: Decode the instruction stored in the instruction register.
sentences.cn: 把存贮在指令寄存器内的指令解码.

sentences.en: He was frowning and wishing he could decode the notations on the slips.
sentences.cn: 他皱着眉,挖空心思地想认出赌签上的记号.

sentences.en: I was able to decode the data from Multinational Inc.
sentences.cn: 我能够破解来自多国公司的数据了.

sentences.en: I will attempt to decode It, sir.
It is harder to decode than traditional algorithms and others and cheap.
sentences.cn: 与传统的和其它加密方法相比,增加了破译难度而系统开销并不大.

sentences.en: On top of this, Dr Brennan and Dr Amos both used a different method from deCODE's.
sentences.cn: 除此之外, 布伦南和阿莫斯教授均采用了和deCODE公司不同的研究方法.

sentences.en: The chief wants you to stay undercover until we decode this information.
sentences.cn: 头要你继续伪装直到我们破解这一信息.

sentences.en: The software decodes the information embedded in the satellite broadcasts.
sentences.cn: 这种软件能够解读衞星广播中的信息。

sentences.en: Viterbi algorithm is the most likelihood decode algorithm of convolution code.
sentences.cn: 维特比译码算法是卷积编码的最大似然译码算法.

sentences.en: You don't need a Ph.D to decode their work, but they do try to challenge audiences with unconventional material.
sentences.cn: 解读他们的作品并不需要有博士学位，但他们的确在尝试用一些非传统素材来挑战观众的接受度。

words.tran_cn: [通信] 解码；[计][通信] 译码

trans.tran_en: to discover the meaning of a message written in a  code (= a set of secret signs or letters )

trans.tran_cn: 译（码），解（码），分析及译解电子信号
trans.tran_en: to discover the meaning of a message written in a  code (= a set of secret signs or letters )
